SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Desert relative to Silverwood Forest?
SRP.A: Sunstone Desert is {above} Silverwood Forest in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Peaks}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total construction starts?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Azure Coast}.

VE.Q: What is Silverwood Forest's Construction Starts in 2019?
VE.A: Silverwood Forest's construction starts in 2019 is {506.39} units/year.

VE.Q: What is Golden Delta's Construction Starts in 2018?
VE.A: Golden Delta's construction starts in 2018 is {387.19} units/year.

VE.Q: What is Shadowfen's Construction Starts in 2024?
VE.A: Shadowfen's construction starts in 2024 is {352.01} units/year.

VE.Q: What are the construction starts of Golden Delta, Crimson Peaks, and Azure Coast in 2018?
VE.A: Golden Delta's construction starts is {387.19} units/year, Crimson Peaks's construction starts is {604.68} units/year, Azure Coast's construction starts is {316.41} units/year.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Construction Starts in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum construction starts is {161.84} units/year.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Construction Starts in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum construction starts is {765.25} units/year.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Construction Starts level recorded for Azure Coast?
EVJ.A: Azure Coast reached approximately {501.99} units/year in {2014}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Construction Starts level recorded for Azure Coast?

SC.Q: What is the average total Construction Starts?
SC.A: The average total construction starts is {3604.32} units/year.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Construction Starts exceed 3737.88 units/year? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

Which years did the total Construction Starts go below 3477.61 units/year? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 2017 and 2019, did the total Construction Starts experience a larger or smaller change than between 2015 and 2020?
NC.A: The change in total construction starts between 2017 and 2019 was {larger} than between 2015 and 2020.

NC.Q: Between 2014 and 2020, was the average total Construction Starts higher or lower than between 2014 and 2019?
NC.A: The average total construction starts between 2014 and 2020 was {higher} than between 2014 and 2019.

NC.Q: Between 2016 and 2017, was the average total Construction Starts higher or lower than between 2016 and 2022?
NC.A: The average total construction starts between 2016 and 2017 was {lower} than between 2016 and 2022.

NC.Q: Between 2015 and 2021, was the average total Construction Starts higher or lower than between 2021 and 2024?
NC.A: The average total construction starts between 2015 and 2021 was {lower} than between 2021 and 2024.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Crimson Peaks} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Azure Coast, Shadowfen, Silverwood Forest, Golden Delta, Crimson Peaks, Sunstone Desert, Veridian Plains}.
